title: Five get into trouble. Parts 1 & 2
brief_description: The children are on a cycling holiday when they are joined by Richard Kent, the twelve year old son of rich parents. Two villains chase and try to capture him, but he escapes. They later kidnap Dick by mistake and take him to the gloomy and ancient manor house, Owl’s Den.
